name: LeakML Memory Leak Detection for C
short_description: LeakML Memory Leak Detection is a C library for detecting and reporting memory leaks.  LeakML was design to be non-intrusive to the application and portable.  Its output is in XML to allow any XML parsing frontend to replay the debugging session.  LeakML
